title: Pixel 3XL froze, went off, won't charge, won't turn on.
content:
My pixel 3XL just froze after fully charging, went off and wo'nt turn on again. Tried everything I could come across but nothing seems to work. Anyone experienced the same issue?
 Its only about 3 months old, no damages, never dropped, never had any issue like this before.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
